meaningMnemonic: An <radical>eye</radical> and <radical>fins</radical> litter the <radical>ground</radical>. What happened? You killed a fish. You must hide the murder <kanji>tool</kanji> before someone finds out it was you.
readingMnemonic: There's <reading>goo</reading> (ぐ) all over your hands. Goopy goo. It's the guts of the fish you just killed and it's dripping off of the <kanji>tool</kanji> as well. Yuck.
